titleInfo.title: A Dynamic Extension of the Foster-Hart Measure of Riskiness

mods.abstract: We analyze the Foster-Hart measure of riskiness for general dis- tributions in dynamic settings. The Foster-Hart measure avoids bankruptcy in the long run. It is not time-consistent.
